sct.thought: I am self-centered for showing of my work I do to people expecting great amazement  in return.
args: You only care for the gratifcation of your work being percived by others in order to fuel your narcisistic superiorty complex.

I only seek validation which is a basic need for self-fulfillment. I am exaggerating the annoyance that I cause to other people if I am causing any at all at the first place. It could all be my imagination.
What about the superiorty complex you form over others? Isn't that self centered?
Well, it is correct that I sometimes form a ``superiorty`` complex over others in my mind, however the thought stays in my mind and often caused by momentery rage coming from being disrespected.

sct.thought: I am going to edit and add a few more tracks to my music recomendations blog post.
args: It is clear that you have no idea what you are doing nor what the true meaning for the songs you recommand are , thus you are not qualified to do so. Trying to relate to topics outside of your understanding is humiliating for yourself.

Sharing ,recommendig and adding my comments on these art pieces even tho I can't relate to most of the mature topics that are covered in these pieces of art are not something to be ashemed off. I should be able to state my likes and dislikes freely as longs as they are respectfull opinions.

sct.thought: Well I managed to go thru all of the exams allthough I might have used techniques some might consider immoral.
args: The fact that you use fancy wording to disclose that you have cheated on those exams does not make the statement any funny or remotely necessery to post. You may even get in trouble if school officals get their filthy eyes on that statement.

The exams were difficult I might have done things I shouldn't have one but I still belive that I have taken the neccesery actions in order to not fall into a disadvantge compared to my peers who use the same moraly questianable techniqes. Also a school offical who is in power to apply legal charges against me finding this post and confronting me about is astronomicaly low.
What if they do so? You have other things you have said here that raises a few eyebrows.

I shouldn't be bother by the things that I have said here since I am sure no offical is intellegant enough to navigate this website nor care enough about me to check out my creative works in order to discover this place.

sct.thought: Hey gues who managed to clone a repo via bash today on his moms shitty laptop
args: It is not impresive to pasta an URL to a command prompt to copy a folder over the internet.
The simple fact that I have a repo to clone should be enough to motivate me.
